Title: Adds a voter's e-mail address and telephone number to the information contained on a voter registration application that is not available for public inspection
Summary: Adds a voter's e-mail address and telephone number to the information contained on a voter registration application that is not available for public inspection.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to adding a voter's e-mail address and telephone number to the information contained on a voter registration application that is not available for public inspection
